name: Clash Of Steel
description:
Created for the seek of gamers wanting to play something in small free periods of time. Clash of steel puts together a retro tank game with a puzzle/strategy game to bring you a short time per stage, fast paced game with completely budget assets and mechanics that will keep you thinking the whole day on ways to beat it! Are you up to challenge the Clash of steel?

How To Play:

-Move the tank with WASD. Aim The Turret with the Mouse and use the Left Button to shoot. If you grab a special weapon you may change the weapon using the Space Bar.

-Stage Two will be available if you manage to beat the First one. You could Press the "U" Button to unlock the Second Stage If the first one was too Difficult for you.
